import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router"; import "./singlePost.css"; export default function SinglePost() { const location = useLocation(); const path = location.pathname.split("/")[2]; const [post, setPost] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { const getPost = async () => { await axios .get("/posts" + path) .then((response) => setPost(response.data)); }; }, [path]); return (
{post.photo && ( )}
